definitions.definition: the writer of a book, article, play, etc.:
examples: He is the author of two books on French history.

definitions.definition: a person who begins or creates something:
examples: She's the author of the company's recent success/of all our troubles.

definitions.definition: to write a book, article, etc.:
examples: He has authored more than 30 books.
The deal is being authored by a Greek diplomat.
